txt.en:
'Greetings, [placeholder]. There are many captains who seek the Path of the Healing Hands, but not all can accomplish their task alone. You should seek to aid your fellow captains along their path.

'The greatest danger your fellow will face is at the Fil-gashan.

'Go now and prove your honour.'

<rgb=#FF0000>This quest can only be completed by helping a captain on their Class quest, \qIn Harm's Way.\q</rgb>
'You have done well, [placeholder]. You are truly a worthy captain.'
The Path of the Healing Hands: Lending a Hand
Many captains seek the Path of the Healing Hands, but not all can accomplish their goals alone.
Helped a captain complete \qIn Harm's Way\q
Help a captain complete \qIn Harm's Way\q
Fil-gashan lies in the south-western reaches of the Flaming Deeps.\n\nWaden has instructed you to help a fellow captain complete his final task at the Fil-gashan.
Waden is just outside Fil-gashan in the south-western reaches of the Flaming Deeps.\n\nWith your task complete, you should return to Waden with news of your success.
